title: The Spiral Line and Arm Lines

questions.question: What is the primary function of the Spiral Line?
choices: To create and control rotation in the body
To flex the arms and hands
questions.answer: To create and control rotation in the body

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a component of the Spiral Line?
How many Arm Lines are there?
Which Arm Line is responsible for flexion of the arm and hand?
What is the role of the Deep Front Arm Line?
choices: Extension of the arm and hand
Flexion of the arm and hand

questions.question: Which Timorese activity particularly engages the Spiral Line?
What is the function of the Superficial Back Arm Line?
choices: Flexion of the arm and hand
Extension of the arm and hand
questions.answer: Extension of the arm and hand

questions.question: Which muscle is NOT part of the Superficial Front Arm Line?
What is the starting point of the Spiral Line?
Which Arm Line is most involved in throwing motions?
What is the relevance of understanding the Arm Lines for Timorese craftspeople?
choices: It helps them choose better materials
It can help prevent repetitive strain injuries
It increases the speed of their work
questions.answer: It can help prevent repetitive strain injuries

questions.question: Which component of the Spiral Line crosses from the back to the front of the body?
What is the main function of the Deep Back Arm Line?
How does the Spiral Line contribute to walking?
choices: It facilitates the natural counter-rotation of shoulders and hips
It prevents rotation in the body
questions.answer: It facilitates the natural counter-rotation of shoulders and hips

questions.question: Which Timorese activity would likely engage the Deep Front Arm Line for fine motor control?
What is the significance of the Arm Lines' connection to the trunk?
choices: It allows for independent arm movement
It enables force transmission between arms and core
questions.answer: It enables force transmission between arms and core

questions.question: Which line is primarily responsible for creating helical movements in the body?
What might be a consequence of Spiral Line dysfunction?
Which Arm Line is most involved in actions such as hugging?
What is the endpoint of the Spiral Line?
Which muscle is a component of the Deep Front Arm Line?
How can understanding the Spiral Line benefit Timorese martial artists?
choices: By enhancing rotational movements in techniques
By reducing the need for practice
questions.answer: By enhancing rotational movements in techniques

questions.question: Which Arm Line is most responsible for extending the fingers?
What is a potential benefit of understanding the Arm Lines for Timorese fishermen?
Which component of the Spiral Line is located on the leg?
What role does the Spiral Line play in lateral flexion?
choices: It has no role in lateral flexion

questions.question: Which Arm Line is most involved in stabilizing the shoulder during arm movements?
How might understanding the Spiral Line help Timorese farmers?
choices: By improving posture during planting and harvesting
By increasing the growth rate of plants
questions.answer: By improving posture during planting and harvesting

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a function of the Spiral Line?
choices: Balancing the left and right sides of the body

questions.question: What is the relationship between the Arm Lines and the Superficial Front and Back Lines?
choices: The Arm Lines are a continuation of the Superficial Lines
The Arm Lines oppose the Superficial Lines
questions.answer: The Arm Lines are a continuation of the Superficial Lines
